name: Carlton F. ANDERSON, Pro Se, Petitioner v. The PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE and David Diguglielmo, S.C.I. of Gaterford, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Anderson v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Carlton F. ANDERSON, Pro Se, Petitioner v. The PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE and David Diguglielmo, S.C.I. of Gaterford, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of June, 2010, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
997 A.2d 328
Carlton F. ANDERSON, Pro Se, Petitioner v. The PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE and David Diguglielmo, S.C.I. of Gaterford, Respondents.
No. 19 EM 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 28, 2010.
